rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {M60019}

description: This unit has been created in collaboration with the Alfred ICU for students seeking credit from studies in critical care in extracorporeal support, transthoracic echocardiography, transoesophageal echocardiography, critical care ultrasound and airway, bronchoscopy and ventilation.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
